title: Seagull Consulting - Courier Solution
author: Mohamed Yassine Hemissi
description: A comprehensive courier management solution for real-time communication between clients, companies, and third-party entities. Developed from scratch as a freelance project.
content:
As part of a freelance project, I contributed to building a comprehensive solution for a company innovating in the courier industry. The platform ensures seamless and real-time communication between clients, companies, and third-party entities, whether governmental or private.

My role included architecting the software, managing its infrastructure, and developing both client-facing and admin-facing components. I designed and maintained the database, implemented a responsive website for clients, and created admin dashboards for monitoring operations. 

The project was built from the ground up with attention to detail, responsiveness, and efficiency, ensuring that all interactions and processes could be tracked in real time.
